content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259612,"originalJapaneseLine":"やばいぞ、もう魔王化が進んでいる、また、鬼畜王戦争のような事を始める直前かもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad, the demon king transformation is already progressing; we might be on the verge of starting something like the Brutal King War again."},{"lineNumber":259613,"originalJapaneseLine":"やるしかない、子供達はランスに挑みます","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no choice but to fight; the children challenge Rance."},{"lineNumber":259614,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":259615,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス強い、圧倒的。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance is strong, overwhelming."},{"lineNumber":259616,"originalJapaneseLine":"子供達は軽く撃破されて、みんな動けなくされます。","translatedEnglishLine":"The children are easily defeated and all become immobilized."},{"lineNumber":259617,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは相変わらず口数少なく怖い印象","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, as usual, is taciturn and gives off a frightening impression."},{"lineNumber":259618,"originalJapaneseLine":"つまらん、この程度か・・さてと倒れた子供達を見るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Boring, is this all... Rance looks at the fallen children."},{"lineNumber":259619,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し考えて居る風、まだ若すぎる、それに我が子には手を出せんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"He seems to be thinking a bit: they're still too young, and besides, I can't lay a hand on my own children."},{"lineNumber":259620,"originalJapaneseLine":"という訳で志津香、お前だ・・・と志津香を起こす","translatedEnglishLine":"So then, Shizuka, it's you... He wakes Shizuka up."},{"lineNumber":259621,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺に刃向かった罪、その身体で償わせてやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"For your sin of opposing me, I will make you atone with your body."},{"lineNumber":259622,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香さんとエールがなんとか立ち上がり反抗しようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka and Yell manage to stand up and try to resist."},{"lineNumber":259623,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香が止める、今のうちにみんなを連れて逃げなさい","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka stops them, saying, 'Take everyone and run away while you still can.'"},{ raped)"},{"lineNumber":259630,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１部のエロなみに激しくで","translatedEnglishLine":"As intense as the erotic scenes in Part 1."},{"lineNumber":259631,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ランス、人外の力で犯す","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Rance assaults her using monstrous, inhuman powers."},{"lineNumber":259632,"originalJapaneseLine":"　立ったままだが、触手等（実物でも魔法物でも）を出して志津香を","translatedEnglishLine":"Though standing, he uses tentacles (real or magical) to assault Shizuka."},{"lineNumber":259633,"originalJapaneseLine":"　激しく犯す","translatedEnglishLine":"He assaults her violently."},{"lineNumber":259634,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エール達はもういないです","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell and the others are no longer there."},{"lineNumber":259635,"originalJapaneseLine":"山の中腹","translatedEnglishLine":"Mid-mountain slope."},{"lineNumber":259636,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふらふらと逃げ出しているエール達","translatedEnglishLine":"Yell and the others are staggering as they flee."},{"lineNumber":259637,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t傷尽き倒れているアームズと合流。　アームズは二度と戦えない身体になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"They join up with Arms, who is wounded and collapsed; Arms' body is no longer able to fight."},{"lineNumber":259638,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどうだったとアームズに聞かれるが、みんなは暗い表情・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms asks how it went, but everyone has dark expressions..."},{"lineNumber":259639,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアームズが身を挺してチャンスを作ってくれたのに自分達は成功しなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Although Arms risked himself to create an opportunity, they did not succeed."},{"lineNumber":259640,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t自分達の力不足を痛感・・・ショックだった","translatedEnglishLine":"They painfully realize their lack of strength... it was a shock."},{"lineNumber":259641,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259642,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに悪魔ネプラカス（爺）が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the demon Nepracas (the old man) appears."},{"lineNumber":259643,"originalJapaneseLine":"久し振りじゃの少年達、とくにエールを見て、お前には興味がある","translatedEnglishLine":"It's been a while, lads. Especially seeing you, Yell, I am interested in you."},{"lineNumber":259644,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぜひ、クエルプランの糧になってもらおう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I definitely want you to become nourishment for the Quelpurn."},{"lineNumber":259645,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんらかの術をすると","translatedEnglishLine":"He performs some kind of technique."},{"lineNumber":259646,"originalJapaneseLine":"空間が歪曲して、こんな場所にクエルプランが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"The space distorts and the Quelpurn appears in this place."},{"lineNumber":259647,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼろぼろに疲れていたエール達は逃げようとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Exhausted Yell and the others try to escape, but..."},{"lineNumber":259648,"originalJapaneseLine":"クエルプランに飲み込まれてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"They are swallowed by the Quelpurn."},{"lineNumber":259649,"originalJapaneseLine":"麓のクルックー達","translatedEnglishLine":"The Krukku group at the foot of the mountain."},{"lineNumber":259650,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女達の元へ悪い知らせが次々と届く","translatedEnglishLine":"Bad news arrives one after another to them."},{"lineNumber":259651,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259652,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルを奪還しようと護衛の精鋭部隊を","translatedEnglishLine":"They dispatched an elite guard unit to recover the icicle Shiel, which was taken by the demon Satera."},{"lineNumber":259653,"originalJapaneseLine":"向かわせたが、山の中腹で魔軍と魔人の迎撃に遭い撃退された","translatedEnglishLine":"They headed there but were repelled in an ambush by demon army and demon at mid-mountain slope."},{"lineNumber":259654,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の数倍の戦力があっても我々が魔王ランスの元に行くのは不可能だった","translatedEnglishLine":"Even with several times our current strength, it would be impossible for us to reach Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":259655,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゆえに人類最強となったランスの子達に託していたのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, they entrusted it to Rance's children, who had become humanity's strongest."},{"lineNumber":259656,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259657,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのランスの子供達も、突然山の中腹に現れた大怪獣クエルプランに","translatedEnglishLine":"Those children of Rance too were suddenly swallowed by the giant monster Quelpurn that appeared mid-mountain slope."},{"lineNumber":259658,"originalJapaneseLine":"飲み込まれたという連絡も入る","translatedEnglishLine":"News also arrives that they’ve been swallowed."},{"lineNumber":259659,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな、全員なの・・はい","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone? All of them? Yes."},{"lineNumber":259660,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259661,"originalJapaneseLine":"姫さん達は絶望・・取り乱す者も居る","translatedEnglishLine":"The princess and others fall into despair... some become distraught."},{"lineNumber":259662,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーを攻める者もいる、あなたが無茶な計画を立てるから！","translatedEnglishLine":"Some blame Krukku, saying it’s because you made a reckless plan!"},{"lineNumber":259663,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに、氷柱シィルの事を何故、もっと早く明かさなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, why didn’t you reveal the matter of the icicle Shiel sooner?"},{"lineNumber":259664,"originalJapaneseLine":"数年前ならリセットのビンタは確実に成功していた、あの時だったら・・","translatedEnglishLine":"A few years ago, the Reset Slap would surely have succeeded, if it had been then..."},{"lineNumber":259665,"originalJapaneseLine":"すみませんと謝るクルックー（でも理由は言わない　","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukku apologizes with 'I'm sorry' (but does not give a reason)."},{"lineNumber":259666,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景　クエルプラン体内","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Inside Quelpurn."},{"lineNumber":259667,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミックスがぼんやり見て感じている、身体は動かないが見る事は出来る","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix is vaguely looking and sensing; her body does not move but she can see."},{"lineNumber":259668,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは・・どこ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is this...?"},{"lineNumber":259669,"originalJapaneseLine":"人体の秘密を探求している彼女らしい考察","translatedEnglishLine":"A typical contemplation of hers, exploring the mysteries of the human body."},{"lineNumber":259670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死後の世界、魂を浄化する場所","translatedEnglishLine":"The afterlife world, a place where souls are purified."},{"lineNumber":259671,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうか、死んだのかな・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, have I died...? "}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいぞ、もう魔王化が進んでいる、また、鬼畜王戦争のような事を始める直前かもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, the demon king transformation is already progressing; we might be on the verge of starting something like the Brutal King War again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるしかない、子供達はランスに挑みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no choice but to fight; the children challenge Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス強い、圧倒的。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is strong, overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達は軽く撃破されて、みんな動けなくされます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The children are easily defeated and all become immobilized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは相変わらず口数少なく怖い印象
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, as usual, is taciturn and gives off a frightening impression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらん、この程度か・・さてと倒れた子供達を見るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boring, is this all... Rance looks at the fallen children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し考えて居る風、まだ若すぎる、それに我が子には手を出せんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to be thinking a bit: they're still too young, and besides, I can't lay a hand on my own children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で志津香、お前だ・・・と志津香を起こす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So then, Shizuka, it's you... He wakes Shizuka up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に刃向かった罪、その身体で償わせてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For your sin of opposing me, I will make you atone with your body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香さんとエールがなんとか立ち上がり反抗しようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka and Yell manage to stand up and try to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香が止める、今のうちにみんなを連れて逃げなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka stops them, saying, 'Take everyone and run away while you still can.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもと渋るエールだが、ナギとかが志津香の言う通りにしなさい、それに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell hesitates, but Nagi and others say to obey Shizuka, and besides,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから始まる事を見られたくないはずとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You surely don't want to witness what is about to happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香はランスにキスされさわられ、ゆっくり服を破られていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka is kissed and touched by Rance, slowly having her clothes torn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間にエール達は逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Yell and the others escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (ＣＧ：志津香レイプ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Shizuka raped)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１部のエロなみに激しくで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As intense as the erotic scenes in Part 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ランス、人外の力で犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rance assaults her using monstrous, inhuman powers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ったままだが、触手等（実物でも魔法物でも）を出して志津香を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though standing, he uses tentacles (real or magical) to assault Shizuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激しく犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He assaults her violently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達はもういないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are no longer there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山の中腹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと逃げ出しているエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are staggering as they flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷尽き倒れているアームズと合流。　アームズは二度と戦えない身体になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They join up with Arms, who is wounded and collapsed; Arms' body is no longer able to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだったとアームズに聞かれるが、みんなは暗い表情・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms asks how it went, but everyone has dark expressions...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが身を挺してチャンスを作ってくれたのに自分達は成功しなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Arms risked himself to create an opportunity, they did not succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達の力不足を痛感・・・ショックだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They painfully realize their lack of strength... it was a shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに悪魔ネプラカス（爺）が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the demon Nepracas (the old man) appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りじゃの少年達、とくにエールを見て、お前には興味がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been a while, lads. Especially seeing you, Yell, I am interested in you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひ、クエルプランの糧になってもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I definitely want you to become nourishment for the Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの術をすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He performs some kind of technique.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空間が歪曲して、こんな場所にクエルプランが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The space distorts and the Quelpurn appears in this place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろに疲れていたエール達は逃げようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exhausted Yell and the others try to escape, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランに飲み込まれてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are swallowed by the Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 麓のクルックー達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Krukku group at the foot of the mountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女達の元へ悪い知らせが次々と届く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bad news arrives one after another to them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルを奪還しようと護衛の精鋭部隊を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They dispatched an elite guard unit to recover the icicle Shiel, which was taken by the demon Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かわせたが、山の中腹で魔軍と魔人の迎撃に遭い撃退された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They headed there but were repelled in an ambush by demon army and demon at mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の数倍の戦力があっても我々が魔王ランスの元に行くのは不可能だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with several times our current strength, it would be impossible for us to reach Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆえに人類最強となったランスの子達に託していたのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, they entrusted it to Rance's children, who had become humanity's strongest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのランスの子供達も、突然山の中腹に現れた大怪獣クエルプランに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those children of Rance too were suddenly swallowed by the giant monster Quelpurn that appeared mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飲み込まれたという連絡も入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: News also arrives that they’ve been swallowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな、全員なの・・はい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone? All of them? Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姫さん達は絶望・・取り乱す者も居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The princess and others fall into despair... some become distraught.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーを攻める者もいる、あなたが無茶な計画を立てるから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some blame Krukku, saying it’s because you made a reckless plan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、氷柱シィルの事を何故、もっと早く明かさなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, why didn’t you reveal the matter of the icicle Shiel sooner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年前ならリセットのビンタは確実に成功していた、あの時だったら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few years ago, the Reset Slap would surely have succeeded, if it had been then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんと謝るクルックー（でも理由は言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku apologizes with 'I'm sorry' (but does not give a reason).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　クエルプラン体内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Inside Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスがぼんやり見て感じている、身体は動かないが見る事は出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix is vaguely looking and sensing; her body does not move but she can see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは・・どこ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人体の秘密を探求している彼女らしい考察
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A typical contemplation of hers, exploring the mysteries of the human body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死後の世界、魂を浄化する場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The afterlife world, a place where souls are purified.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、死んだのかな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, have I died...?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばいぞ、もう魔王化が進んでいる、また、鬼畜王戦争のような事を始める直前かもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, the demon king transformation is already progressing; we might be on the verge of starting something like the Brutal King War again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やるしかない、子供達はランスに挑みます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no choice but to fight; the children challenge Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス強い、圧倒的。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is strong, overwhelming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達は軽く撃破されて、みんな動けなくされます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The children are easily defeated and all become immobilized.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは相変わらず口数少なく怖い印象
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, as usual, is taciturn and gives off a frightening impression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらん、この程度か・・さてと倒れた子供達を見るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boring, is this all... Rance looks at the fallen children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し考えて居る風、まだ若すぎる、それに我が子には手を出せんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to be thinking a bit: they're still too young, and besides, I can't lay a hand on my own children.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で志津香、お前だ・・・と志津香を起こす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So then, Shizuka, it's you... He wakes Shizuka up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に刃向かった罪、その身体で償わせてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For your sin of opposing me, I will make you atone with your body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香さんとエールがなんとか立ち上がり反抗しようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka and Yell manage to stand up and try to resist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香が止める、今のうちにみんなを連れて逃げなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka stops them, saying, 'Take everyone and run away while you still can.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもと渋るエールだが、ナギとかが志津香の言う通りにしなさい、それに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell hesitates, but Nagi and others say to obey Shizuka, and besides,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから始まる事を見られたくないはずとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You surely don't want to witness what is about to happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香はランスにキスされさわられ、ゆっくり服を破られていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka is kissed and touched by Rance, slowly having her clothes torn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その間にエール達は逃げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Yell and the others escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: (ＣＧ：志津香レイプ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Shizuka raped)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１部のエロなみに激しくで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As intense as the erotic scenes in Part 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ランス、人外の力で犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rance assaults her using monstrous, inhuman powers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 立ったままだが、触手等（実物でも魔法物でも）を出して志津香を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though standing, he uses tentacles (real or magical) to assault Shizuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激しく犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He assaults her violently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達はもういないです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are no longer there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山の中腹
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと逃げ出しているエール達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell and the others are staggering as they flee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傷尽き倒れているアームズと合流。　アームズは二度と戦えない身体になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They join up with Arms, who is wounded and collapsed; Arms' body is no longer able to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうだったとアームズに聞かれるが、みんなは暗い表情・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arms asks how it went, but everyone has dark expressions...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アームズが身を挺してチャンスを作ってくれたのに自分達は成功しなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although Arms risked himself to create an opportunity, they did not succeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達の力不足を痛感・・・ショックだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They painfully realize their lack of strength... it was a shock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに悪魔ネプラカス（爺）が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the demon Nepracas (the old man) appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りじゃの少年達、とくにエールを見て、お前には興味がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been a while, lads. Especially seeing you, Yell, I am interested in you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜひ、クエルプランの糧になってもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I definitely want you to become nourishment for the Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの術をすると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He performs some kind of technique.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空間が歪曲して、こんな場所にクエルプランが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The space distorts and the Quelpurn appears in this place.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろに疲れていたエール達は逃げようとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exhausted Yell and the others try to escape, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランに飲み込まれてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are swallowed by the Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 麓のクルックー達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Krukku group at the foot of the mountain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女達の元へ悪い知らせが次々と届く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bad news arrives one after another to them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラに奪われた氷柱シィルを奪還しようと護衛の精鋭部隊を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They dispatched an elite guard unit to recover the icicle Shiel, which was taken by the demon Satera.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かわせたが、山の中腹で魔軍と魔人の迎撃に遭い撃退された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They headed there but were repelled in an ambush by demon army and demon at mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の数倍の戦力があっても我々が魔王ランスの元に行くのは不可能だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even with several times our current strength, it would be impossible for us to reach Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆえに人類最強となったランスの子達に託していたのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Therefore, they entrusted it to Rance's children, who had become humanity's strongest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのランスの子供達も、突然山の中腹に現れた大怪獣クエルプランに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those children of Rance too were suddenly swallowed by the giant monster Quelpurn that appeared mid-mountain slope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飲み込まれたという連絡も入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: News also arrives that they’ve been swallowed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな、全員なの・・はい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone? All of them? Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姫さん達は絶望・・取り乱す者も居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The princess and others fall into despair... some become distraught.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーを攻める者もいる、あなたが無茶な計画を立てるから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some blame Krukku, saying it’s because you made a reckless plan!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、氷柱シィルの事を何故、もっと早く明かさなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, why didn’t you reveal the matter of the icicle Shiel sooner?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年前ならリセットのビンタは確実に成功していた、あの時だったら・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few years ago, the Reset Slap would surely have succeeded, if it had been then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんと謝るクルックー（でも理由は言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku apologizes with 'I'm sorry' (but does not give a reason).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　クエルプラン体内
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Inside Quelpurn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスがぼんやり見て感じている、身体は動かないが見る事は出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mix is vaguely looking and sensing; her body does not move but she can see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは・・どこ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人体の秘密を探求している彼女らしい考察
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A typical contemplation of hers, exploring the mysteries of the human body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死後の世界、魂を浄化する場所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The afterlife world, a place where souls are purified.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、死んだのかな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, have I died...?
